results.name: Arithmetic derivative of squares: a(n) = 2*n*A003415(n).
link: Bruno Berselli, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (MAGMA) Ad:=func<h | h*(&+[Factorisation(h)[i][2]/Factorisation(h)[i][1]: i in [1..#Factorisation(h)]])>; [0] cat [Ad(n^2): n in [2..50]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 22 2013
